compliant.section: 會員就個人資料之權利：我們蒐集個人資料之會員，依個人資料保護法得對我們行使以下權利：(1) 查詢或請求閱覽。(2) 請求製給複製本。(3) 請求補充或更正。(4) 請求停止蒐集、處理或利用。(5) 請求刪除。
compliant.legal_provisions: Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing

non_compliant.section: 會員如欲行使上述權利，可透過網站內的「聯絡我們」進行申請。
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Right to information shall be provided in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.
non_compliant.amend: It is recommended to provide a clear and direct way to exercise these rights, such as a dedicated form or email address, rather than directing users through a general "Contact Us" section.

non_compliant.section: 我們不會將您的個人資料販售給第三方。
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Data must be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner. This section only addresses selling data but not other forms of processing, such as sharing with third parties for other purposes.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify all purposes of data processing and the legal basis for each purpose. Explicitly state whether data is shared with third parties and for what purposes.

non_compliant.section: 如沒有收集個人資料之必要，我們會停止收集或是使用您的個人資料。
non_compliant.legal_provisions: Data minimisation: Personal data shall be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are processed.
non_compliant.amend: This statement aligns with GDPR but is not sufficient. The policy should proactively state that data will only be collected if necessary for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes.
